dataManager

Class DMComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataManager.DMComponent

  • public class DMComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Manager component
    Author:
    pedroirivera-vega This class implements and object the groups together all the different operations with the data that is being managed by the system. In this case, the different lists that the system manages.
